about_the_game:
You've found yourself in a very familiar situation. Just you and that warm plate of spaghet.

Well, in this case, plates...

You've been tasked to complete 4 special spaghet dishes in order to earn your freedom. Sounds simple enough, right?

Unfortunately, you aren't only one trying to get their hands on that precious pasta.

They see you, and they don't appreciate you trying to take what's theirs.

You're back in that dreaded kitchen. This time instead of keeping a single, measly plate of spaghet warm, there are now four! In addition to that...

...you must cook the spaghet yourself.

Baby, Mama, Papa, and Goldie are back as well, and they'll be trying to take you out at every opportunity.

SPAGHET 2: Al Dente Chapter brings new mechanics over it's predicessor. The first? You're no longer stuck behind that counter!
Freely move around the kitchen to gather ingredients, cook, slap, and avoid danger!

Discover the truth about hot plates and cold spaghetti.
Will you survive?

============================================================


Your Objective:
Cook and protect your Spaghet from Papa, Mama, Baby, and Goldie. Each one is dealt with in a different way, and become more aggressive as time passes.

There are many audio queues in the game so headphones are recommended.

-Story-driven gameplay
-Survive to uncover the story.

name: SPAGHET 2: Al Dente Chapter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 515 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970/1060 or ATI Radeon R9 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 515 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You just couldn't keep your hands to yourself... could you?
